attributes.action: Give all the Gurkha's equal pension rights as our own forces receive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the Gurkha's pensions are supposedly to rise, only a few will receive an increase. These men deserve better as they stand alongside our own forces and therefore deserve parity.

rejection.details:
HM Government announced changes to Gurkha pension arrangements on 8 March 2007:
http://www.gnn.gov.uk/Content/Detail.asp?ReleaseID=269670&NewsAreaID=2
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
